Desc.entry: Aims to promote and celebrate diversity in Sheffield through music and song, to create ways for people to develop skills in identifying, recording and interpreting their musical heritage, and to build accessible resources conserving the city's diverse musical traditions so future generations can enjoy them. Runs projects to collect and share songs from all over the world that were brought here and now form a part of the city. These include songs that are part of people's lives, that parents sang, family events and songs sung when people get together. Runs workshops in singing songs and styles from Europe, Asia, Africa and the Americas, in a relaxed atmosphere for singers and non singers alike.
